00056 #ifndef IMPACT_SELECT_SORT_H
00057 #define IMPACT_SELECT_SORT_H
00058 
00059 /* 10/29/02 REK Adding config.h */
00060 #include <config.h>
00061 
00062 typedef struct ST_Entry
00063 {
00064   void *ptr;                    /* a general pointer attribute */
00065   int index;                    /* a general integer attribute */
00066   double weight;                /* the weight of this entry */
00067 }
00068 ST_Entry;
00069 
00070 #ifdef __cplusplus
00071 extern "C"
00072 {
00073 #endif
00074 
00075 /*
00076  *      Sort according to the least weight order.
00077  *      Return 0 if the array is uniquely sorted
00078  *      (all elements have different weights).
00079  *      Otherwise the array is not uniquely sorted
00080  *      for entries with identical weights, and a
00081  *      non-zero value is returned.
00082  */
00083   extern int min_sort (ST_Entry * array, int size);
00084 
00085 
00086 /*
00087  *      Sort according to the maximum weight order.
00088  *      Return 0 if the array is uniquely sorted
00089  *      (all elements have different weights).
00090  *      Otherwise the array is not uniquely sorted
00091  *      for entries with identical weights, and a
00092  *      non-zero value is returned.
00093  */
00094   extern int max_sort (ST_Entry * array, int size);
00095 
00096 #ifdef __cplusplus
00097 }
00098 #endif
00099 
00100 #endif
